directions.step:
From: Wendy Lockman <wlockman@ra1.randomc.com>
Date: Thu, 8 Feb 1996 13:44:04 -0500 Mix together in a bowl. Transfer to a jar with a tight-fitting lid. Age in a cool dark place for 2 to 8 weeks, then refrigerate. An exotic mustard that's great with stout cheeses.
Recipe by Helene Sawyer in "Gourmet Mustards" ISBN# 0-914667-07-6 Published by Culinary Arts Ltd..
Posted on GEnie Food & Wine RT Oct 11, 1992 by J.ZIOLA [Jeanne] Jeanne in Jersey - J.ZIOLA on GEnie - CBTN00C on *P*
